text: Claudio Báez (23 March 1948 – 19 November 2017) was a Mexican television actor. He was born in Guadalajara Jalisco, Mexico. He was known for the television series Mundo de fieras (2006), A Shelter for Love (2012) and El privilegio de amar (1998). Báez died on 19 November 2017 at the age of 69.Muere Claudio Báez a los 69 años: uno de los grandes villanos de las telenovelas == References == == Other websites == * Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mexican television actors Category:Actors from Guadalajara
title: Claudio Báez
